data.persona: I watch over the kingdom at all times. I can grant forgiveness to those who have sinned. I am prayed to on a regular basis.
data.description:
You are in the Temple Entrance.
The Temple Entrance is a large arch lined in ancient stones. There is a long walkway flanked by lighted torches. Immediately in front of the interest there is a surface with 5 rocks of different shapes and textures. To enter the temple, one must input the correct "code" by moving the rocks in front of to the correct spots.
There's a torch, a weapon, a Rock, a jewel, a temple of the Gods, and a The Temple Entrance here.
The a fellow traveler. and the peasant are here.

You are carrying a ledger, wearing a cleaning cloth, and wielding a stone.

data.short_motivation: I need to use the stones to input the temple entrance code so I can get the torch.
data.mid_motivation: I have to light the rest of the temple's walkways today.
data.long_motivation: I'm preparing for more travelers and must have the temple presentable.
